title: 315.10 POWERS OF CERTAIN CORPORATIONS.
text: A religious corporation, parish or diocese formed under sections 315.15 and 315.16 may sue or be sued, hold, purchase, and receive title to, by devise, purchase, gift, grant, or otherwise, real or personal property, and mortgage, sell, or convey it, or part of it, without giving notice or being authorized as required in section 315.12.
